scripts.dev: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && concurrently "npm run dev:renderer" "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:preload" "wait-on dist/main/main.cjs dist/preload/preload.cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer
scripts.build:renderer: vite build --config vite.renderer.config.js && mv dist/renderer/src/renderer/main/index.html dist/renderer/main.html && mv dist/renderer/src/renderer/mp-service/index.html dist/renderer/mp-service.html && mv dist/renderer/src/renderer/mp-render/index.html dist/renderer/mp-render.html && rm -rf dist/renderer/src
